remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為物件衍生自，一起使用時將它們複製。Because objects derive from , they are copied when they are used. 因此，更新版本中，您可能會無法擷取，或移除您加入使用原始的集合物件。Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the you added to the collection using the original object. 集合中是一份原始，並被視為不同比您所加入。The in the collection is a copy of the original and is considered a different than the one you added.

summary.span: 傳回可逐一查看這個集合的列舉程式。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An that can iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 列舉值無法用來修改基礎集合中。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉值位於集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，您必須呼叫列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 設定下一個項目。 sets to the next item. 傳遞集合的結尾後，列舉值會放置在集合中，最後一個項目之後和呼叫傳回`false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要設定集合一次的第一個項目，您可以呼叫後面。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉值將失效且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，會傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改集合中，這會導致擲回例外狀況的列舉值。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋集合是向前開始的第一個主要畫面格，並在最後一個主要畫面格結束。The collection is searched forward starting at the first key frame and ending at the last key frame. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 亦即，這個方法是 O (*n*) 運算，其中*n*是。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移位後面移除的物件的物件，以佔用空出的位置，並更新其索引值。The objects that follow the removed object are shifted to occupy the vacated position, and their index values are updated. 如果`value`已`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，則第一次為 null 參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 移除項目。If `value` is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the first null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) entry is removed. 請注意，移除為 null 參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 項目中是線性集合的大小。Note that removing a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) entry is linear in the size of the collection.
